snippet.title: The Midnight Crimes - Official Trailer | Latin American Games Showcase
snippet.description:
Learn more about the story and see the gritty world of The Midnight Crimes in this latest trailer for the upcoming point-and-click detective adventure game. The Midnight Crimes will be available on PC, PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X/S, and Nintendo Switch. A demo for The Midnight Crimes is available now on Steam.

In The Midnight Crimes, you are a retired private detective investigating the case of a missing child while facing his own past demons. Midnight Cove, the wicked Victorian city you live in, features semi-open world mechanics, side-quests, pets, character relationships, and much more.

#IGN #Gaming
